Title: AI for Enhanced Security in DevOps
Abstract: Integrating AI for enhanced security in DevOps is essential in today’s digital landscape. AI automates vulnerability scanning and threat detection, enabling proactive security measures. Embrace AI to strengthen security and foster innovation in software delivery.

Title: Leveraging AI in DevOps: Next-Generation Strategies for Enhanced Efficiency and Innovation
Abstract: The landscape of software development and IT has been transformed by the DevOps practices, aiming to unify software development and software operation. The assimilation of AI has further revolutionized this domain, offering significant advancements in efficiency, reliability, and innovation.

Title: AI in the Machine Room: How Smart Algorithms Transformed Our Data Center Operations
Abstract: Discover how we revolutionized data center operations using AI, slashing equipment failures by 47% and boosting efficiency by 31%. Get practical insights from real deployments that saved millions. Walk away with actionable strategies to transform your facility, whether it's 1MW or 50MW.

Title: Optimizing Real-Time IP Monitoring with Human-Assisted AI: Transforming DevOps for Precision and Scalability
Abstract: Discover how human-AI collaboration is revolutionizing real-time IP monitoring! Learn to harness active learning and semi-automated workflows to reduce false positives, boost recall, and slash review times by 40%. This talk equips you with actionable strategies to protect IP

Title: Building Trust in Generative AI: Accuracy Evaluation and Automation
Abstract: Generative AI meets precision with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), combining retrieval and generation for accurate, context-aware responses. This talk unveils a framework for automated RAG evaluation, integrated into CI/CD pipelines, ensuring continuous improvement and reliable AI solutions.

Title: AI-Driven Safety Systems in Autonomous Vehicles: A DevOps Approach to Real-Time Intelligence
Abstract: Discover how AI and DevOps converge to power the future of autonomous vehicles! Learn about real-time safety systems, sensor fusion, and ultra-reliable AI models reducing collisions by 37%.Explore cutting-edge tech like 1,000 TOPS NPUs and V2X communication redefining transportation safety standards

Title: Integrating Generative AI into Cloud-Native DevOps
Abstract: Integrating AI into DevOps revolutionizes software development by automating code generation, enhancing CI/CD pipelines, and boosting security. This session examines how AI-driven automation accelerates development cycles, reduces errors, and optimizes resource management.

Title: AskDataAI: Democratizing Enterprise Data Access Through Context-Aware AI Agents at DoorDash
Abstract: Discover how DoorDash revolutionized data access for 15,000+ employees with AskDataAI, achieving 40% better search relevance and 35% faster queries.Learn how we combined vector search,GPT-4 , robust security to build an AI platform that democratizes data while maintaining enterprise-grade protection

JobTitle1: Business Program Manager - Azure Technical Trainer
Title: Integrating and Migrating Azure DevOps with GitHub
Abstract: Microsoft DevOps Solutions means needing to choose between keep using Azure DevOps or GitHub. But what if you can use the best of both worlds? And what does that mean for your real-life DevOps scenarios? Exactly what this talk will be about, where talking means tons of demos.

JobTitle1: Azure Core Specialist for Regulated Industries
Title: Azure Ascension: Navigating the Cloud Migration Journey with Precision and Pace
Abstract: Unlock the full potential of Azure with our session on cloud migration! Learn the roadmap for seamless application transitions, minimize disruption, and enhance efficiency. Ideal for DevOps leaders aiming for a smooth journey to the cloud.

Title: AI-Powered Cloud Architectures: Redefining Cost Optimization and Operational Excellence in DevOps
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming cloud architectures! Learn to slash costs by 42%, boost efficiency by 53%, and secure your infrastructure with 99.7% threat detection. Packed with real-world case studies and actionable insights, this session is your roadmap to revolutionizing DevOps.

Title: Mastering Cloud and Serverless Automation: The SDET’s Guide to Success
Abstract: Unlock the future of testing with cloud and serverless automation! This talk equips SDETs with practical strategies to validate APIs, test infrastructure, and tackle performance issues. With Java demos, you’ll learn what works, what to avoid, and how to build scalable, high-quality apps confidently.

Title: Money-saving tips for the frugal serverless developer
Abstract:
Let's explore some common costly mistakes in AWS and serverless and learn actionable tips for cutting down waste and reducing your AWS bill.
Whether you're looking to cut down on CloudWatch costs or improve cost-efficiency for your serverless application, we've got some helpful tips for you.

Title: Have your head in the clouds while keeping your feet firmly on the ground
Abstract: Have you ever had any doubts about your applications going to the cloud? What about the remaining on-premise deployments? Edge? And what the heck is fog? Head spinning already? Good. We might just have a solution for you: a meta operating system approach to the cloud-fog-edge computing continuum.

Title: Navigating the Digital Evolution: A Technologist's Guide to Thriving in the Age of Innovation
Abstract: Unlock the secrets of thriving in tech with a presentation on innovation, skill enhancement, and leadership. Elevate your career and brand on LinkedIn, connecting with pioneers and shaping the future.

Title: Culture is Still a Challenge
Abstract: When the only tool you have is a hammer, every problem looks like a nail. For technical teams, their control over their environment is often limited to the technical tools they choose to use to implement their projects.

Title: Impostor syndrome in Tech
Abstract:
It’s a very important topic. A tremendous amount of people struggle with impostor syndrome, waste their potential and degrade their mental health.
The material is useful even for people familiar with impostor syndrome, as I’m presenting over 20 particular tips and associated psychological mechanisms

Title: The power of quiet engineers
Abstract: In the extrovert-dominated tech environment, the contributions of quiet engineers often go unnoticed. This talk will show the assets that introverts bring to the table and will provide a roadmap for both organizations and quiet professionals on how to maximize their potential.

Title: Architecting Real-Time Analytics: Building Scalable Data Pipelines for Customer Experience Excellence
Abstract: Discover how to architect real-time analytics pipelines that process 1M+ events/second with 99.99% uptime. Through hands-on case studies, learn how top companies built resilient data systems that reduced incident response by 67%.

Title: Bring your DataOps to the Data Lakehouse: What are the benefits and how to navigate the common challenges
Abstract: DataOps principles go well in tandem with Data Lakehouse architectures, and both help in aligning stakeholders, managing change, and driving trust in data. Backing up our considerations with real-world examples, let's voice some actionable points for overcoming the common implementation challenges.

Title: 1 Table is Worth 1000 Words
Abstract: Much important data is in the form of tables. And yet, it remains an underutilized resource. In this talk, we discuss recent research in multimodal models for tabular data and how it can be applied to create business value.

Title: Modern Data Warehousing in Banking: How Smart Architecture Drives 60% Faster Analytics
Abstract: Discover how leading banks slashed reporting time by 60% using modern data warehouse architectures. Get practical insights from $50M+ implementations, including hybrid cloud optimization, AI-driven quality management, and blockchain integration. Real architectures, real numbers, real results.

Title: Combatting Antibiotic Resistance in UTI Treatment: Phase 3 Insights on Sulopenem vs. Ciprofloxacin
Abstract: Discover how we’re revolutionizing UTI treatment in the fight against antibiotic resistance! Learn about sulopenem's groundbreaking success against multi-drug resistant pathogens, offering hope where other antibiotics fail. Join us for game-changing insights into the future of infection management!

Title: Healthcare's Digital Revolution: Achieving 94% Security Enhancement Through Next-Generation Data Architecture and Zero-Trust Implementation
Abstract: Transform healthcare with proven strategies that have reduced data retrieval latency by 73% and saved millions. Learn how leading institutions achieved 94% reduction in security threats while revolutionizing patient care through AI, blockchain, and edge computing.

Title: DevOps Excellence in Healthcare: Orchestrating a Large-Scale CRM Implementation that Slashed Response Times by 83%
Abstract: Discover how our team revolutionized healthcare delivery through DevOps excellence, achieving 83% faster response times and zero downtime. Learn battle-tested strategies for large-scale CRM deployment, automated compliance, and seamless scaling that handled 200% more users

Title: Mastering the Chaos: A DevOps Engineer's Journey to Cost-Effective Cloud Monitoring and Logging
Abstract: Explore how a budget-tight startup successfully implemented an open-source monitoring and logging system. I'll share challenges, triumphs, and best practices from my journey, offering insights for any company weighing these options.

Title: Don't Panic! Effective Incident Response
Abstract:
In today’s world, service downtime significantly impacts any business. Responding quickly and proactively to issues can dramatically reduce the repercussions of any incident, both financially and reputationally.
Let's review some lessons learned and help improve your Incident Response practices.

Title: Shaping the Future of System Resilience: A DevOps Journey into Advanced Site Reliability Engineering
Abstract: Discover how advanced Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) principles, combined with cutting-edge DevOps practices, can revolutionize system resilience and scalability. Learn real-world strategies in chaos engineering, AI-driven automation,

Title: A Tale of Two Outages
Abstract: Having been at ground zero for two serious outages that made 'above the fold' news, this is one part oral history from behind the scenes, one part informal case study, and one part lessons learned for the Danger Sidekick outage of 2009 and the Amazon Prime Day outage of 2018.

Title: Scaling DevOps Infrastructure: Lessons from HPC Architecture for Cloud-Native Performance and Efficiency
Abstract: Discover how cutting-edge HPC architecture secrets can supercharge your DevOps infrastructure! Learn to leverage 400 Gb/s interconnects and integrated CPU-GPU solutions to slash power costs by 75% while maximizing performance.

Title: Refining the Release Strategy of a Custom Linux Distro
Abstract: In today's fast-paced development environment, a robust and efficient release process is critical for delivering reliable software on time. Let's explore how continuously improving the release flow enables more frequent and agile updates even for complex products, such as custom Linux distros.

Title: Linux Load Average Myths and Realities
Abstract: When it comes to monitoring system performance on Linux, the load average is one of the most referenced metrics. Displayed prominently in tools like `top`, `uptime`, and `htop`, it’s often used as a quick gauge of system load and capacity. But how reliable is it?

Title: Leveraging LLMs in DevOps
Abstract: LLMs like ChatGPT are revolutionizing DevOps by automating code reviews, enhancing CI/CD pipelines, and streamlining incident management. This session explores how LLMs boost efficiency, reduce errors, and transform workflows, while addressing challenges like data security and ethical considerations

Title: DevSecOps at Scale: Multi-Agent System for Automating Build Failures with LLMs in Large Enterprise IT Ecosystems
Abstract: Build failures in large-scale DevSecOps environments cause costly delays. We developed a multi-agent system using LLMs to automate build failure resolution within Infosys, supporting 100+ apps. This led to a 45% reduction in MTTR, 50% less troubleshooting time, and a 40% productivity boost.

Title: AI-Powered Fraud Detection: Revolutionizing Financial Security with Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
Abstract: Discover how AI-powered fraud detection is revolutionizing financial security, achieving 97% accuracy in real-time threat detection while slashing false positives by 63%. Learn how our cutting-edge systems process 100k transactions per second, block 98% of phishing attempts

Title: From the Top: Mastering the DevOps Machine Learning Pipeline for Unrivaled Innovation - A CEO's Perspective on Cool DevOps
Abstract: From a CEO's perspective, integrating DevOps with machine learning pipelines is key to strategic advantage, driving innovation, market agility, and operational efficiency. This presentation underscores real-world successes and views DevOps as crucial for future business growth.

Title: Kubernetes Minus the Blind Spots
Abstract: In this session, we'll share practical strategies for combining topology insights with existing observability tools to pinpoint issues faster and resolve them with confidence.

Title: 15 NGINX Metrics to Monitor
Abstract: Let's take a look at some of the basic NGINX metrics to monitor and what they indicate. We start with the application layer and move down through process, server, hosting provider, external services, and user activity. With these metrics, you get coverage for active and incipient problems with NGINX

Title: The future of Observability - the next 10 years
Abstract: In the next decade, observability will transform through AI, real-time processing, and predictive analytics. This talk explores proactive monitoring, rapid troubleshooting, and deep system insights. Learn about AI-driven anomaly detection, open standards, and tackling distributed system complexities

Title: Future-Proofing Enterprise Cybersecurity: Network Segmentation Meets Zero Trust for DevOps Excellence
Abstract: Discover how to revolutionize cybersecurity for DevOps! Learn to integrate Network Segmentation and Zero Trust Architecture to block 70% of lateral attacks, cut insider risks by 80%, and boost network performance by 20%. Walk away with actionable strategies to future-proof your enterprise security!

Title: Serverless Workflow Orchestration on AWS
Abstract: The talk will cover micro-service orchestration, focusing on designing systems for performance and scalability. We’ll discuss best practices for developing complex workflows with tools like AWS Step Functions and Lambda. Join me in unlocking the potential of serverless workflow orchestration.

Title: Transforming Financial Markets with AI-Powered Trading Systems
Abstract: Unlock the future of trading! Learn how cutting-edge AI techniques like reinforcement learning and deep learning are revolutionizing algorithmic trading. Gain insights into building AI-driven platforms, boosting market performance, and staying ahead in a rapidly evolving financial landscape.

Title: Driving Digital Excellence in Banking: Cloud Modernization for 3x Efficiency and 45% Growth
Abstract: Discover how leading banks achieve 3x efficiency and 45% revenue growth with cloud and data modernization! Learn to process 100,000 transactions/sec, cut costs by 67%, and launch services 90% faster. This talk is your blueprint for driving innovation and dominating the digital banking era!

Title: AI-Powered Mobile App Performance: From Data to Delightful User Experiences
Abstract: Discover how to revolutionize mobile app performance using AI-driven monitoring and predictive analytics. Learn practical strategies from real-world examples to automate optimization, prevent performance issues before they occur, and create delightful user experiences that drive revenue.

Title: Scaling: from 0 to 25 million users
Abstract: Real-life examples from running a system that handles 25 million monthly active users generating 350 billion requests and 1 PB of data every month all without breaking the bank. Demystifying scale and showcasing easy low hanging fruit that is often overlooked.

Title: Mobile Application Security Assessments Automation with MobSF and Jenkins pipeline
Abstract: With mobile app usage and attacks on the rise, automating Mobile AppSec is essential. MobSF, a powerful security platform for Android and iOS, integrates seamlessly with Jenkins pipelines to automate security assessments. This ensures consistent, efficient testing, strengthen app security at scale.

Title: Unf*cking Secrets At Enterprise Scale
Abstract: Secrets management is vital to prevent hacks and breaches. Discover SecretOps, a DevOps-aligned workflow, to securely manage and sync secrets across clouds, reducing risks of outages and breaches. Learn how to secure deployments at enterprise scale.

Title: Environment as a service: unlock innovation and speed up products development
Abstract: At your organization, how easy is for any product team ask for a new environment or either scale an existing one? It should be as fast as possible to not disturb fast flow to production.

Title: Third-Party APIs: The Good, The Bad, and the Vulnerable
Abstract: Discover the untold stories behind integrating third-party APIs, unveiling their benefits, pitfalls, and crucial security considerations. This insightful talk equips developers and businesses with the knowledge needed to harness the power of APIs responsibly and effectively.

Title: Adopting Zero-Trust Security Strategy in Serverless application Deployment
Abstract: Zero Trust Security Framework deployed as guardrails to verify every request as if it originates from an open network and anticipates that threats can be both internal and external using Enterprise Solutions like Hashicorp Sentinel and Open-source tools like Kyverno and Open Policy Agent.

Title: Strengthening Cross-Cloud AI Privacy and Security: A Blockchain and Federated Learning Framework for Compliance-Driven DevOps
Abstract: Discover a groundbreaking approach to AI privacy and security! This talk unveils a framework that fuses blockchain with federated learning, allowing secure, cross-cloud AI training on sensitive data. Learn how DevOps teams can boost compliance, prevent tampering

Title: Securely Unifying Deployments in an Organization for Increased Governance.
Abstract: Security in your pipeline is the first line of defense against vulnerabilities, breaches and compliance issues, like Captain America's impenetrable shield. This talk explains how security can easily be integrated into your pipeline so that your team can safely build, deploy and grow at every stage.

Title: How to Start a Successful DevSecOps Program
Abstract: This presentation walks through the patterns of successfully starting of a DevSecOps program from scratch. It focuses on the strategies to be successful and the lessons learned along the way. Lastly, this talk concludes how the recent EO of SBOM shapes the next steps of DevSecOps maturity.

Title: Threat Modeling in DevOps: A Practical Guide for Developers
Abstract: Shift security left with threat modeling! Learn how to identify, mitigate, and validate risks in your DevOps pipelines without slowing down delivery. This practical guide for developers will arm you with tools, real-world examples, and actionable steps to build secure software at DevOps speed!

Title: Beyond the Perimeter: Next-Generation Cloud Security Strategies in an Era of Evolving Threats
Abstract: Discover how leading enterprises are revolutionizing cloud security with AI, quantum-resistant encryption, and zero-trust architectures. Learn battle-tested strategies that cut breach costs by millions, slash attack surfaces by 90%, and detect threats 50x faster.

Title: What is Going On Within My Network? A subtle introduction to Cilium Hubble
Abstract: In this session, we’ll deep dive into Hubble and how Hubble leverages eBPF technology for deep visibility at the kernel level. Key features like real-time monitoring, comprehensive network flow visibility, and security enforcement, crucial for today's cloud native applications, will be highlighted.

Title: How to hack a cloud production environment with external Terraform manipulation
Abstract: The power of Terraform providers & modules are undeniable, but so are the potential security risks if not properly managed. This session covers how widely-used Terraform open source components can be exploited to gain full control of a cloud production environment and best practices for mitigation.

Title: Securing Embedded Systems in IoT: A Practical DevOps Approach
Abstract: Explore practical strategies to secure embedded systems in IoT using a DevOps approach. Learn how to integrate security into every stage of development, from design to deployment, ensuring resilience against cyber threats without compromising innovation or performance.

Title: Cloud-Powered Open Banking: Revolutionizing Financial Services with 71% Higher Consumer Engagement and Enhanced Security
Abstract: Discover how cloud-powered Open Banking is revolutionizing finance with staggering results: 71% higher engagement, 43% lower costs, and reaching millions of underserved customers. Learn how leading institutions are leveraging military-grade security

Title: Secure Integration of Private Testing Infrastructure with Public GitHub Repositories
Abstract: Cloud-based CI/CD tools are great. But what happens when the tested product introduces limitations that don't allow for this approach? Learn how to securely achieve full integration between GitHub and privately hosted CI/CD services such as Jenkins without compromising the internal infrastructure.

Title: DevOps Test Management Strategies
Abstract: Test management in a DevOps framework, how to construct your strategy for testing, what to have in mind and why you should always have an individual test plan at SDLC level, at project level and company level. We will also learn the importance to have two test approaches working at the same time.

Title: Practical Coding Principles for Sustainable Development
Abstract: Learn how "less is more" in coding: sustainable principles to create maintainable, quality codebases that stand the test of time and evolve with ease.

Title: 4 Pillars of Successful Agile Test Automation
Abstract: In a movie, 4 elements had to be brought together to save the planet :) If even one of them was missing, the formula would not work. Based on this analogy, let’s discuss the 4 elements of test automation. See the trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vzqOqcYiGq0

Title: Tackling Flaky Tests: Strategies for Reliability in Continuous Testing
Abstract: Flaky tests disrupt CI/CD, causing unreliable results and slowing pipelines. Join this session to learn how to identify, isolate, and eliminate them. Discover techniques to diagnose root causes, boost test reliability, and improve software delivery quality.

Title: Advanced Test Harness Infrastructure for Validating ARM and FPGA-based Systems
Abstract: Delivering quality in the fast-evolving landscape of software and hardware integration requires automated, rigorous, and continuous testing - this is where our innovative test harness comes in. Let's learn how to enhance QA and streamline testing by using both general and custom-built technologies.

Title: Unlocking Developer Efficiency: AI-Enhanced Tools for the Future of DevOps
Abstract: Unlock the future of DevOps with AI-powered tools that supercharge developer productivity! Learn how to leverage AI-driven coding assistants, smart integrations, and cutting-edge models to accelerate development, reduce errors, and innovate faster. Don’t miss out on transforming your DevOps workflow

Title: Give Your managed kubernetes Troubleshooting Skills a Superpower with AI and K8sGPT
Abstract: Troubleshooting K8s clusters, including Oracle OKE, is challenging for DevOps teams. Enter K8sGPT era: a new tool leveraging AI to provide real-time insights and context analysis. Join this session to see how it integrates with AI (OpenAI, Cohere, or Ollama) to enhance Kubernetes operations.

Title: Building an Open-Source, DIY Private DBaaS with Dapr
Abstract: Tired of DBaaS lock-in? Divine explores Sovereign DBaaS, a model putting you back in control. Learn how to build your own private DBaaS with Dapr, overcoming compliance and licensing headaches. Gain insights from real-world feedback and design considerations.

Title: API-First Development: Supercharging Your Software's Potential
Abstract: In this session I'll explain why companies should build their products with an API-first mindset to foster innovation, improve communication across teams and improve team productivity. Having this approach is key for companies to survive and prosper. I'll do a mix of slides and demos.

Title: Military Digital Transformation: Accelerating Strategic Advantage through Cloud-AI Integration and Smart Workflow Orchestration
Abstract: Discover how the marriage of cloud computing, AI, and workflow orchestration is revolutionizing modern military operations. With 43% faster decision-making and 91% threat detection accuracy, learn how these technologies are creating a new paradigm in warfare while delivering 4.1x ROI.

Title: Zero-infrastructure transformations for your streaming needs
Abstract: Data scientists should not need to know Kubernetes to deal with the infrastructure.

Title: Request rate driven load balancing with Haproxy between multiple sites
Abstract: Harness the power of HAProxy to master real-time load balancing across global networks. Discover how to dynamically manage traffic spikes and prevent site overloads, ensuring optimal performance without the cost of unused capacity. Join us to transform your approach to global traffic management!

Title: Revolutionizing Telecommunications with AI: Driving Efficiency, Performance, and Sustainability
Abstract: Discover how AI is transforming telecommunications! From 90% traffic prediction accuracy to 30% energy savings, this talk unveils real-world breakthroughs in 5G, security, and infrastructure. Learn how AI boosts efficiency, cuts costs, and shapes the future of connected networks. Don’t miss out!

Title: Transforming IoT Data Management: Scalable Architectures and Security Innovations
Abstract: Unlock the future of IoT with cutting-edge strategies for scalable, secure, and efficient data management! Explore hybrid edge-cloud architectures, real-time ML analytics, and quantum-safe encryption. From smart cities to healthcare, gain actionable insights to transform IoT performance, innovation!

Title: Intelligent Connectivity: Unlocking the True Potential of IoT in Transforming Industries
Abstract: Unlock the transformative power of IoT! Discover how 15+ billion connected devices are revolutionizing industries with smarter, faster, and more efficient solutions. From healthcare to smart homes, learn actionable insights and real-world breakthroughs driving the $1.39 trillion IoT revolution!

Title: From Patchwork to Picasso: Refactoring 80+ Angular projects and what went wrong
Abstract:
Ever feel like your codebase is more Frankenstein's Monster than a masterpiece? Juggling 180+ Angular projects can lead to inconsistencies, inefficiencies, and pure chaos. But what if there was a way to transform that patchwork into a beautiful, unified solution?
Find out how in the talk.

Title: Revolutionizing Business Intelligence with AI-Powered Data Quality: Metrics, Case Studies, and Strategies for Success
Abstract: Unlock the power of AI to transform data quality! Learn how cutting-edge techniques boost accuracy by 42%, slash costs by 35%, and process data 250x faster. Packed with real-world case studies and actionable strategies, this session will revolutionize your approach to business intelligence.
